name: GaugeStyle
desc: Defines the implementation of all gauge instances within a view hierarchy.

items.name: static var automatic: DefaultGaugeStyle
items.desc: The default gauge view style in the current context of the view being styled.

items.name: static var circular: CircularGaugeStyle
items.desc: A gauge view that visually indicates its value using an open ring, which has a visual indicator as the value increases, and displays the currentValueLabel the center of the gauge.

items.name: static var linear: LinearGaugeStyle
items.desc: A gauge view that visually indicates its value using a bar, which has a continuous visual indicator as the value increases.

items.name: func makeBody(configuration: Self.Configuration) -> Self.Body
items.desc: Creates a view representing the body of a gauge.

items.name: typealias Configuration
items.desc: The properties of a gauge instance.

items.name: associatedtype Body : View
items.desc: A view representing the body of a gauge.

items.name: struct DefaultGaugeStyle
items.desc: The default gauge view style in the current context of the view being styled.

items.name: struct CircularGaugeStyle
items.desc: A gauge view that visually indicates its value using an open ring, which has a visual indicator as the value increases, and displays the currentValueLabel the center of the gauge.

items.name: struct LinearGaugeStyle
items.desc: A gauge view that visually indicates its value using a bar which has an continuous visual indicator as the value increases.
